text:
TITLE:
      Observational Study of Botox® Treatment for Patients With Upper Limb Adult Spasticity
SUMMARY:
      This is a prospective, non-interventional, observational study to collect data on the use of
      botulinum toxin Type A in a routine setting in patients with upper limb adult spasticity.
ELIGIBILITY CRITERIA:
      Inclusion Criteria:
          -  Adult patients with upper limb spasticity following a stroke
          -  Eligible to receive botulinum toxin Type A
          -  No previous botulinum toxin Type A therapy
        Exclusion Criteria:
